verses.name: Psalms 150:1
verses.text: Alleluja.   Laudate Dominum in sanctis ejus ;  laudate eum in firmamento virtutis ejus.

verses.name: Psalms 150:2
verses.text: Laudate eum in virtutibus ejus ;  laudate eum secundum multitudinem magnitudinis ejus.

verses.name: Psalms 150:3
verses.text: Laudate eum in sono tub√¶ ;  laudate eum in psalterio et cithara.

verses.name: Psalms 150:4
verses.text: Laudate eum in tympano et choro ;  laudate eum in chordis et organo.

verses.name: Psalms 150:5
verses.text: Laudate eum in cymbalis benesonantibus ;  laudate eum in cymbalis jubilationis.
